title: Foundations (Month 1) — Build the Ground You Stand On
description: Master the essential building blocks of AI engineering including Python programming, data handling, mathematical foundations, and text analysis. This month establishes the core skills needed for all subsequent AI work. You'll learn to manipulate data, perform exploratory analysis, and understand the mathematical principles behind machine learning algorithms.

modules.title: Introduction to AI
topics: What is AI? History and categories
Overview of AI/ML subfields
Real-world applications and trends (LLMs, Edge AI)

additionalResources.title: AI For Everyone - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course by Andrew Ng covering AI basics and business applications

additionalResources.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence - Khan Academy
additionalResources.description: Free AI fundamentals and machine learning basics

additionalResources.title: Machine Learning Crash Course - Google
additionalResources.description: Free ML fundamentals with TensorFlow

modules.title: Python for AI Engineering
topics: Data types, OOP basics, API calls, virtual environments
Data acquisition and cleaning: CSV, JSON, Excel, missing values, outliers
Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Using Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn; intro to Plotly/Altair

additionalResources.title: Python for Data Science - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free Python course with data science focus

additionalResources.title: Pandas Tutorial - W3Schools
additionalResources.description: Free pandas data manipulation tutorials

additionalResources.title: Data Analysis with Python - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free course covering NumPy, Pandas, and data visualization

modules.title: Mathematical Essentials
topics: Linear algebra: vectors, matrices, eigenvalues
Calculus: derivatives, chain rule, gradients, optimization intuition
Probability & Statistics: distributions, Bayes' Rule, significance, hypothesis testing

additionalResources.title: Linear Algebra - Khan Academy
additionalResources.description: Free comprehensive linear algebra course

additionalResources.title: Calculus - Khan Academy
additionalResources.description: Free calculus fundamentals including derivatives and optimization

additionalResources.title: Statistics and Probability - Khan Academy
additionalResources.description: Free statistics course covering distributions and hypothesis testing

modules.title: Intro to Text EDA
topics: Tokenization (NLTK, spaCy), stop-word removal, n-grams
TF-IDF, word-count features, word-frequency histograms/word clouds

additionalResources.title: Natural Language Processing - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free NLP course covering text preprocessing and analysis

additionalResources.title: NLTK Tutorial - NLTK Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free comprehensive NLTK tutorial and documentation

additionalResources.title: Text Analysis with Python - Real Python
additionalResources.description: Free tutorial on text analysis and NLP with Python

project: Build a Data Explorer CLI and notebook for EDA and text analysis. Deliver summary stats, visualizations, and a Jupyter walkthrough.
monthly_task: Analyze a public dataset, tell a story through visualizations, suggest ML use-cases, and optionally publish on GitHub.
reading_list: The Hundred-Page Machine Learning Book (Andriy Burkov)
Natural Language Processing with Python (Bird, Klein & Loper)

title: Machine Learning Foundations & MLOps (Month 2) — From Notebook to Production
description: Learn to build, evaluate, and deploy machine learning models with production-grade reliability. This month covers core ML concepts, model evaluation techniques, and the essential tools for taking models from development to deployment. You'll master scikit-learn workflows and learn to containerize and serve models.

modules.title: Core ML Concepts
topics: Supervised learning: regression vs. classification
Model families: Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forests, KNN
Bias–variance, overfitting, regularization

additionalResources.title: Machine Learning - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course by Andrew Ng covering supervised and unsupervised learning

additionalResources.title: Machine Learning with Python - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free course covering scikit-learn and ML fundamentals

additionalResources.title: StatQuest - YouTube
additionalResources.description: Free YouTube channel explaining ML concepts with clear visualizations

modules.title: Experimentation & Model Evaluation
topics: Data/version management (DVC), experiment tracking (MLflow, W&B)
Evaluation metrics: accuracy, precision, recall, F1, ROC-AUC, perplexity
Validation: confusion matrix, cross-validation, BLEU/ROUGE for text

additionalResources.title: MLflow Tutorial - Databricks
additionalResources.description: Free MLflow tutorials and examples

additionalResources.title: DVC Tutorial - DVC Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free DVC tutorials for data version control

additionalResources.title: Model Evaluation Metrics - Towards Data Science
additionalResources.description: Free comprehensive guide to ML evaluation metrics

modules.title: ML Workflows with Scikit-Learn
topics: Preprocessing, pipelines, feature selection, GridSearchCV
CLI interface for training/evaluation

additionalResources.title: Scikit-Learn Tutorial - Official Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free official scikit-learn tutorials and examples

additionalResources.title: Machine Learning Pipelines - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free course covering ML pipelines and workflows

additionalResources.title: Feature Engineering - Kaggle
additionalResources.description: Free Kaggle course on feature engineering techniques

modules.title: Docker Fundamentals
topics: Writing Dockerfiles, building/running images, containerization basics

additionalResources.title: Docker Tutorial - Docker Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free official Docker getting started guide

additionalResources.title: Docker for Beginners - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free Docker tutorial for beginners

additionalResources.title: Docker Tutorial - W3Schools
additionalResources.description: Free comprehensive Docker tutorial

modules.title: Packaging, Serving & Observability
topics: Saving models, dependency management, REST API with FastAPI/Flask
Monitoring: logging requests, MLflow/Prometheus metrics

additionalResources.title: FastAPI Tutorial - Official Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free official FastAPI tutorial

additionalResources.title: Flask Tutorial - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free Flask and API development course

additionalResources.title: Prometheus Tutorial - Prometheus Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free Prometheus monitoring tutorial

project: Production-ready ML CLI and REST API. Includes training scripts, evaluation reports, serving endpoints, Dockerfile, and logs.
monthly_task: End-to-end ML API project: EDA, training, serving, and documentation in GitHub.
reading_list: Hands-On ML with Scikit-Learn, Keras & TensorFlow (Ch. 1–2, 6)

title: Deep Learning & Service Prototype (Month 3) — From Pixels to Product
description: Dive into deep learning fundamentals and build neural networks for real-world applications. This month covers neural network architectures, PyTorch/TensorFlow frameworks, and specialized models like CNNs and Transformers. You'll learn to train, tune, and deploy deep learning models as containerized services.

modules.title: Deep Learning Fundamentals
topics: Neural network architectures (MLPs), activation functions, forward/backpropagation, optimizers

additionalResources.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course by Andrew Ng covering neural network fundamentals

additionalResources.title: Deep Learning - MIT OpenCourseWare
additionalResources.description: Free MIT course on deep learning fundamentals

additionalResources.title: 3Blue1Brown Neural Networks - YouTube
additionalResources.description: Free YouTube series explaining neural networks visually

modules.title: Frameworks
topics: PyTorch vs. TensorFlow basics, high-level APIs (nn.Module, tf.keras.Model)

additionalResources.title: PyTorch Tutorial - Official Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free official PyTorch tutorials and examples

additionalResources.title: TensorFlow Tutorial - Official Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free official TensorFlow tutorials

additionalResources.title: Deep Learning with PyTorch - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free course covering PyTorch and deep learning

modules.title: Transformer Primer
topics: Attention mechanisms, positional encodings, encoder/decoder blocks
Build a toy character-level Transformer in PyTorch

additionalResources.title: Attention Is All You Need - Paper Walkthrough
additionalResources.description: Free YouTube video explaining the Transformer paper

additionalResources.title: The Illustrated Transformer - Jay Alammar
additionalResources.description: Free visual guide to understanding Transformers

additionalResources.title: Transformer Tutorial - Hugging Face
additionalResources.description: Free course on Transformers and attention mechanisms

modules.title: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
topics: Conv2D, pooling, flatten, dense layers; CNN for image classification (MNIST, CIFAR-10)

additionalResources.title: CNN Tutorial - TensorFlow
additionalResources.description: Free CNN tutorial with TensorFlow

additionalResources.title: Convolutional Neural Networks - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course on CNNs by Andrew Ng

additionalResources.title: CNN Visualization - YouTube
additionalResources.description: Free video explaining how CNNs work visually

modules.title: Model Training & Tuning
topics: Loss functions, accuracy, regularization, data augmentation

additionalResources.title: Improving Deep Neural Networks - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course on hyperparameter tuning and optimization

additionalResources.title: Data Augmentation Tutorial - TensorFlow
additionalResources.description: Free tutorial on data augmentation techniques

additionalResources.title: Regularization Techniques - Towards Data Science
additionalResources.description: Free guide to regularization in deep learning

project: Dual-model API (CNN & Mini-Transformer), Jupyter notebooks, saved models, FastAPI service, Dockerfile, and sample tests.
monthly_task: Train and compare CNN and Transformer models, containerize, and test locally.
reading_list: Deep Learning with PyTorch (Eli Stevens et al.)
Hands-On ML with Scikit-Learn, Keras & TensorFlow (Ch. 10–12)
Vaswani et al., 'Attention Is All You Need'

title: AI Engineering — Prompting, RAG & Agentic Apps (Month 4) — Building Intelligent, Interactive LLM Applications
description: Master the art of building intelligent applications powered by large language models. This month focuses on prompt engineering, retrieval-augmented generation, and creating agentic systems that can reason and interact with external tools. You'll learn to build sophisticated LLM applications with advanced prompting techniques and RAG pipelines.

modules.title: Prompt Engineering & LLM APIs
topics: Few-shot, zero-shot, chain-of-thought, system/user prompts
Interacting with OpenAI, Hugging Face, Cohere APIs; rate limits, safety

additionalResources.title: Prompt Engineering Guide - OpenAI
additionalResources.description: Free official OpenAI prompt engineering guide

additionalResources.title: Prompt Engineering - DeepLearning.AI
additionalResources.description: Free course on prompt engineering for developers

additionalResources.title: Hugging Face Course - Free
additionalResources.description: Free course on using Hugging Face models and APIs

modules.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
topics: Embeddings, chunking, semantic search, vector stores (FAISS, Chroma)
Query rewriting, context injection, document ingestion pipelines

additionalResources.title: RAG Tutorial - LangChain
additionalResources.description: Free RAG implementation tutorial with LangChain

additionalResources.title: Vector Databases - Pinecone
additionalResources.description: Free guide to vector databases and embeddings

additionalResources.title: FAISS Tutorial - Facebook Research
additionalResources.description: Free FAISS documentation and tutorials

modules.title: Agentic Systems & LangChain
topics: LangChain components: chains, memory, retrievers
Building tool-enabled agents, API/data integrations

additionalResources.title: LangChain Tutorial - Official Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free LangChain tutorials and documentation

additionalResources.title: Building LLM Agents - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free tutorial on building AI agents with LangChain

additionalResources.title: LangChain Cookbook - GitHub
additionalResources.description: Free collection of LangChain examples and recipes

modules.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) & Light MLOps
topics: Anthropic's MCP spec, server/client setup, experiment tracking

additionalResources.title: MCP Documentation - Anthropic
additionalResources.description: Free MCP specification and documentation

additionalResources.title: MLOps Fundamentals - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free guide to MLOps fundamentals

additionalResources.title: Experiment Tracking - Weights & Biases
additionalResources.description: Free experiment tracking documentation and tutorials

modules.title: LLM Evaluation & Fine-Tuning
topics: Automated metrics (perplexity, BLEU/ROUGE, BERTScore), human evaluation, fine-tuning workflows, monitoring costs

additionalResources.title: LLM Evaluation - Hugging Face
additionalResources.description: Free evaluation metrics library and tutorials

additionalResources.title: Fine-Tuning Guide - OpenAI
additionalResources.description: Free guide to fine-tuning language models

additionalResources.title: LoRA Tutorial - Microsoft
additionalResources.description: Free LoRA implementation and tutorials

project: Fine-tuned RAG agent with ingestion, embedding, retrieval, evaluation report, and UI (Gradio/Streamlit).
monthly_task: Full RAG + agentic workflow, MCP integration, UI, and ethics report.

title: AI Hardware & Optimization (Month 5) — Engineering for Efficiency — From Silicon to Serving
description: Understand the hardware foundations and optimization techniques that power high-performance AI systems. This month covers GPU architectures, model optimization strategies, and deployment tools that enable efficient inference. You'll learn to optimize models for different hardware platforms and understand the trade-offs between performance and efficiency.

modules.title: Hardware Essentials for AI/ML
topics: Server/GPU infrastructure, CPU architectures, memory, I/O
GPU architecture, CUDA, OpenCL, AI accelerators (TPUs, NPUs, ASICs)
Probabilistic, thermodynamic, and quantum computing basics

additionalResources.title: CUDA Programming - NVIDIA
additionalResources.description: Free CUDA programming guide and documentation

additionalResources.title: GPU Computing - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course on GPU computing fundamentals

additionalResources.title: TPU Tutorial - Google Cloud
additionalResources.description: Free TPU tutorials and documentation

modules.title: Model Optimization & Efficiency
topics: Quantization, pruning, knowledge distillation
LLM optimizations: QLoRA, tensor/pipeline parallelism

additionalResources.title: Model Optimization - TensorFlow
additionalResources.description: Free TensorFlow model optimization guide

additionalResources.title: Quantization Tutorial - PyTorch
additionalResources.description: Free PyTorch quantization tutorials

additionalResources.title: Model Compression - Stanford
additionalResources.description: Free course materials on model compression techniques

modules.title: Tools
topics: ONNX, TensorRT, DeepSpeed, Hugging Face Optimum, Triton, vLLM

additionalResources.title: ONNX Tutorial - Official Documentation
additionalResources.description: Free ONNX tutorials and getting started guide

additionalResources.title: TensorRT Tutorial - NVIDIA
additionalResources.description: Free TensorRT documentation and tutorials

additionalResources.title: DeepSpeed Tutorial - Microsoft
additionalResources.description: Free DeepSpeed tutorials and examples

project: Optimize and deploy a Transformer (e.g., DistilBERT), report on quantization/pruning, and benchmark latency/throughput.
monthly_task: Benchmark CPU vs GPU vs TPU for a DL task, recommend optimization strategy, and justify trade-offs.
reading_list: Efficient Processing of Deep Neural Networks (Sze et al.)

title: Capstone, Benevolence & Professional Growth (Month 6) — From Engineer to Leader — Building AI with Purpose and Impact
description: Build and deploy a complete AI solution while developing your professional identity as an AI engineer. This month combines technical implementation with ethical considerations and career development. You'll create a portfolio-worthy project while learning to present your work effectively and responsibly.

modules.title: Capstone Projects & Real-World Integration
topics: End-to-end solution design: frontend, backend, model, infrastructure
Translating problems into technical architectures, peer reviews, mentor check-ins
Demo best practices for technical/non-technical audiences

additionalResources.title: Full-Stack Development - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free full-stack development curriculum

additionalResources.title: System Design - YouTube
additionalResources.description: Free system design tutorials and case studies

additionalResources.title: Project Management - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free project management fundamentals course

modules.title: Professional Development & Responsible AI
topics: Resume/portfolio crafting, LinkedIn storytelling, interview prep
Agile project management, LLM benevolence/ethics, bias audits, RLHF, privacy/security, explainability, environmental impact, networking

additionalResources.title: Responsible AI - Google
additionalResources.description: Free resources on responsible AI development

additionalResources.title: AI Ethics - Coursera
additionalResources.description: Free course on AI ethics and responsible development

additionalResources.title: Technical Interview Prep - freeCodeCamp
additionalResources.description: Free technical interview preparation resources

project: Portfolio polish and LLM demo: update GitHub README, create demo video, LinkedIn post, and Notion/portfolio update.
monthly_task: Individual full-stack AI app: frontend, backend (LLM-powered), deployment, ethics write-up, demo video, and professional polish.
reading_list: The AI Engineer's Career Guide (Chip Huyen)
